name: Huye
description:
Space shooter played using only two buttons. Made for 2 Buttons Jam.

Controls:

  • Keyboard
    • Shoot left: Left arrow/A
    • Shoot Right: Right arrow/D
  • Xbox controller
    • Shoot left: Left bumper/A
    • Shoot right: Right bumper/B

Music by Purple Planet www.purple-planet.com
